/*MyPageDAO.selectPointHistory 포인트 변동 이력 조회*/
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TPOH.REGISTER_DT) AS ROW_NUM , TPOH.USER_NUM , GET_CODE_NAME('COM1006', TPOH.POINT_CHANGE_CD) AS POINT_CHANGE_NM , TPOH.ADD_POINT , TPOH.DEDUCT_POINT , COALESCE(SUM(TPOH2.ADD_POINT), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(TPOH2.DEDUCT_POINT), 0) AS REMAIN_POINT , DATE_FORMAT(TPOH.REGISTER_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') REGISTER_DT , TPOH.CHANGE_DT FROM T_POINT_HISTORY TPOH LEFT JOIN T_POINT_HISTORY TPOH2 ON TPOH.USER_NUM = TPOH2.USER_NUM AND TPOH2.SEQ <= TPOH.SEQ
AND TPOH.USER_NUM = #{userNum}
AND TPOH.REGISTER_DT >= STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') /* 시작날짜만 있고 종료날짜는 없는경우*/
AND TPOH.REGISTER_DT <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') /* 종료날짜만 있고 시작날짜는 없을경우*/
AND TPOH.REGISTER_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY TPOH.USER_NUM, TPOH.POINT_CHANGE_CD, TPOH.ADD_POINT, TPOH.DEDUCT_POINT, TPOH.REGISTER_DT, TPOH.CHANGE_DT

/*MyPageDAO.selectPointHistoryTotalCount 포인트 변동 이력 총 건수*/
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TPOH.REGISTER_DT) AS ROW_NUM , TPOH.USER_NUM , GET_CODE_NAME('COM1006', TPOH.POINT_CHANGE_CD) AS POINT_CHANGE_NM , TPOH.ADD_POINT , TPOH.DEDUCT_POINT , COALESCE(SUM(TPOH2.ADD_POINT), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(TPOH2.DEDUCT_POINT), 0) AS REMAINING_POINT , DATE_FORMAT(TPOH.REGISTER_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') REGISTER_DT , TPOH.CHANGE_DT FROM T_POINT_HISTORY TPOH LEFT JOIN T_POINT_HISTORY TPOH2 ON TPOH.USER_NUM = TPOH2.USER_NUM AND TPOH2.SEQ <= TPOH.SEQ
AND TPOH.USER_NUM = #{userNum}
AND TPOH.REGISTER_DT >= STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') /* 시작날짜만 있고 종료날짜는 없는경우*/
AND TPOH.REGISTER_DT <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') /* 종료날짜만 있고 시작날짜는 없을경우*/
AND TPOH.REGISTER_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY TPOH.USER_NUM, TPOH.POINT_CHANGE_CD, TPOH.ADD_POINT, TPOH.DEDUCT_POINT, TPOH.REGISTER_DT, TPOH.CHANGE_DT

/*MyPageDAO.selectSalesSummary 판매현황 목록 조회*/
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TPR.REGISTER_DT) AS ROW_NUM , TPR.PRODUCT_NUM /* 상품번호*/ , TPR.PRODUCT_NM /* 상품명*/ , TPR.REGISTER_QUANTITY /* 등록수량*/ , TPR.REMAIN_QUANTITY /* 남은수량*/ , NVL(T01.ORDER_QUANTITY, 0) AS ORDER_QUANTITY /* 판매수량*/ , TPR.PRODUCT_STATUS_CD AS PRODUCT_STATUS_CD /* 상품상태코드*/ , EVERYTHINGSHOP.GET_CODE_NAME('COM1004', TPR.PRODUCT_STATUS_CD) AS PRODUCT_STATUS_NM /* 상품상태명*/ , (NVL(T01.ORDER_QUANTITY, 0) / TPR.REGISTER_QUANTITY) * 100 AS SALES_RATE /* 판매율*/ , NVL(T01.SUM_PRICE, 0) AS SUM_PRICE /* 누적 판매금액*/ FROM T_PRODUCT TPR LEFT JOIN (SELECT TORP.PRODUCT_NUM , SUM(TORP.ORDER_QUANTITY) AS ORDER_QUANTITY , SUM(TORP.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE) AS SUM_PRICE FROM T_ORDERED_PRODUCT TORP LEFT JOIN T_ORDER TOR ON TORP.ORDER_NUM = TOR.ORDER_NUM AND TOR.ORDER_STATUS_CD IN ('01', '03') /* 주문완료 또는 구매확정만 조회*/
AND TOR.REGISTER_DT >= STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') /* 시작날짜만 있고 종료날짜는 없는경우*/
AND TOR.REGISTER_DT <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') /* 종료날짜만 있고 시작날짜는 없을경우*/
AND TOR.REGISTER_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY TORP.PRODUCT_NUM ) T01 ON TPR.PRODUCT_NUM = T01.PRODUCT_NUM

/*MyPageDAO.selectSalesSummaryTotalCount 판매현황 목록 건 수 조회*/
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TPR.REGISTER_DT) AS ROW_NUM , TPR.PRODUCT_NUM /* 상품번호*/ , TPR.PRODUCT_NM /* 상품명*/ , TPR.REGISTER_QUANTITY /* 등록수량*/ , TPR.REMAIN_QUANTITY /* 남은수량*/ , NVL(T01.ORDER_QUANTITY, 0) AS ORDER_QUANTITY /* 판매수량*/ , TPR.PRODUCT_STATUS_CD AS PRODUCT_STATUS_CD /* 상품상태코드*/ , EVERYTHINGSHOP.GET_CODE_NAME('COM1004', TPR.PRODUCT_STATUS_CD) AS PRODUCT_STATUS_NM /* 상품상태명*/ , (NVL(T01.ORDER_QUANTITY, 0) / TPR.REGISTER_QUANTITY) * 100 AS SALES_RATE /* 판매율*/ , NVL(T01.SUM_PRICE, 0) AS SUM_PRICE /* 누적 판매금액*/ FROM T_PRODUCT TPR LEFT JOIN (SELECT TORP.PRODUCT_NUM , SUM(TORP.ORDER_QUANTITY) AS ORDER_QUANTITY , SUM(TORP.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE) AS SUM_PRICE FROM T_ORDERED_PRODUCT TORP LEFT JOIN T_ORDER TOR ON TORP.ORDER_NUM = TOR.ORDER_NUM AND TOR.ORDER_STATUS_CD IN ('01', '03') /* 주문완료 또는 구매확정만 조회*/
AND TOR.REGISTER_DT >= STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') /* 시작날짜만 있고 종료날짜는 없는경우*/
AND TOR.REGISTER_DT <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') /* 종료날짜만 있고 시작날짜는 없을경우*/
AND TOR.REGISTER_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY TORP.PRODUCT_NUM ) T01 ON TPR.PRODUCT_NUM = T01.PRODUCT_NUM

/*MyPageDAO.selectAllUser 관리자 기능 유저조회*/
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TUS.REGISTER_DT DESC) AS ROW_NUM , TUS.USER_NUM , TUS.USER_ID , TUS.USER_NM , GET_CODE_NAME('COM1003',TUS.GRADE_CD) AS GRADE_NM , CASE WHEN TSEA.SELLER_APPLY_STATUS_CD = '01' THEN TSEA.SELLER_APPLY_STATUS_CD ELSE GET_CODE_NAME('COM1001',TUS.ROLE_CD) END AS ROLE_NM , TSEA.APPLY_NUM , NVL(TOR.TOTAL_PAYMENT,'0') AS TOTAL_PAYMENT , TO_CHAR(TUS.REGISTER_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD' ) AS REGISTER_DT FROM T_USER TUS LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TOR.USER_NUM , SUM(TORP.FINAL_PAYMENT_PRICE ) AS TOTAL_PAYMENT FROM T_ORDER TOR INNER JOIN T_ORDERED_PRODUCT TORP ON TOR.ORDER_NUM = TORP.ORDER_NUM GROUP BY TOR.USER_NUM )TOR ON TUS.USER_NUM = TOR.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_NUM , REGISTER_DT , SELLER_APPLY_STATUS_CD , APPLY_NUM FROM ( SELECT USER_NUM , REGISTER_DT , SELLER_APPLY_STATUS_CD , APPLY_NUM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY USER_NUM ORDER BY REGISTER_DT DESC) AS RN FROM T_SELLER_APPLY ) A WHERE RN = 1 )TSEA ON TUS.USER_NUM = TSEA.USER_NUM

AND TUS.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
